function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High error rate in KGs, with mistakes in entity and relation matching","Impact":"Inaccurate data representation, potential misinformation","Mitigation":"Improve error analysis processes, implement better fact-checking mechanisms","Technologies":"Automated data validation and fact-checking tools","People":"Data curators, knowledge engineers","Owner":"Data management teams"},{"Description":"Limited schema overlaps and entity matches between KGs","Impact":"Difficulty in integrating knowledge, potential for incomplete or inconsistent data","Mitigation":"Improve schema matching algorithms, establish common data standards","Technologies":"Schema matching algorithms, data standardization tools","People":"Data architects, knowledge engineers","Owner":"Data integration teams"},{"Description":"Duplicated entities in the encyclopedia KG","Impact":"Potential for conflicting or redundant information","Mitigation":"Implement entity resolution processes, establish data deduplication mechanisms","Technologies":"Entity resolution algorithms, data deduplication tools","People":"Data curators, knowledge engineers","Owner":"Data management teams"}]}
